channel.title: Skype debate: does any body mind?
channel.description: Well I am very nervous and a absolute wreck when it comes to public speaking. I don't know why I get afraid. It's the only thing I fear, I can sleep after watching thousands of horror movies and pop ups and go to sleep. But if I was ever told to go to speak in front of people even like groups of 7 I get nervous and breakdown. I was hoping since many of you in the debate section do have fine pointers... Perhaps have a several people debate or just speaking in general in Skype. My senior year is coming... Rising senior.... Mind Skyping with me and help me get rid of anxiety thanks Skype:troyrocker22

item.title: Skype debate: does any body mind?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

You know whats worse then knowing about having to publicly speak? When you’re put on the spot to publicly speak, but it helps just to think on what you’re talking about rather then those around you.

Read full topic
item.source: Skype debate: does any body mind?

item.title: Skype debate: does any body mind?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Yeah. Stop giving a shit about what other useless faggots you won’t see in another year think.

item.title: Skype debate: does any body mind?

item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Well I am very nervous and a absolute wreck when it comes to public speaking. I don’t know why I get afraid. It’s the only thing I fear, I can sleep after watching thousands of horror movies and pop ups and go to sleep. But if I was ever told to go to speak in front of people even like groups of 7 I get nervous and breakdown.
I was hoping since many of you in the debate section do have fine pointers… Perhaps have a several people debate or just speaking in general in Skype.
My senior year is coming… Rising senior…
Mind Skyping with me and help me get rid of anxiety thanks
Skype:troyrocker22
